response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection or business. Considering its intrinsic value and market demand, I am offering this exclusive item to you for $12,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its worth to us and its perceived value to you, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial transaction. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
